6,Verify Successful Checkout Process with Added Items to Shopping Cart,"Navigate to the home page and access the category of accessories. Set price range filters and search for a specific product. Add the product to the cart, proceed to checkout, and complete the payment process. Verify the successful completion of the checkout.","Step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com/
Step 2: Click on link 'Accessories' -> Navigate to page 'category/accessories'

Step 4: Enter input value in input field 'price max'
Step 5: Click on button 'Search'

Step 7: Click on svg
Step 8: Click on button ' Buy'
Step 9: Click on link ' Place an order' -> Navigate to page ''
Step 10: Click button and proceed to checkout page
